Posts.Content: Sep 1, 2012 11:26PM Susan266 wrote: Pugaloo, I have had bloody discharge from my nipple. Actually very bloody. It was a papilloma directly below my nipple. Surgically removed Totally benign. Single pappilomas don't seem to be associated with any increase in chance of BC. Don't worry.
